entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • User Claims missing from Identity Endpoints breaks Authorization #52142
  • Buttons must have discernible text #52141
  • Cannot build docker app after upgrade to .NET 8 (with blazor) #52140
  • Blazor: NavigationManager - NavigateTo bug with parameters #52138
  • JWT Authentication Error: Bearer error="invalid_token" #52137
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #52136
  • Perf improvement: json #52135
  • Incorrect child component content is rendered with static SSR or prerendering on server #52131
  • RenderMode not working with razor class libraries #52129
  • SwaggerUI broken by primitive return values + endpoint filters #52128
  • DOMException: Failed to execute 'setStartBefore' on 'Range': the given Node has no parent. #52126
  • Page reload in Maui Hybrid Blazor app causes unhandled exception #52119
  • Race condition in JSRuntime on cancellation #52117
  • RouteHandlerAnalyzer throwing exception. #52114
  • Milestones - Inconsistencies #52113
  • error ASP0023: Route '[action]' conflicts with another action route #52110
  • Blazor Web App Run Error when project name contain Chinese #52109
    8.0.x

Closed

  • "dotnet new grpc" doesn't build on a macbook pro m3 #52132
  • [.NET 8] ASP.NET Core Web API Server is Not Accessible in Docker #52059
  • Blazor.web.js broke since official .NET 8 #52074
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, endpoint #52097
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52112
  • [Blazor .NET 8] The same component instance rendered in different pages when using interactive mode #52102
    Planning: WebUI
  • Error Form Submission in asp.net Core MVC #51644
  • OutputCacheMiddleware changes a response behavior of failed bindings issues #51050
    8.0.0
  • enhance interactiveAuto renderMode #52127
  • .NET 8 - Angular + ASP.NET Core template, deleting .vscode folder bugs out the deploy #52116
  • ASP.NET Core and hosting bundles need success blocker #33819
    3.1.x
  • IFormFile incompatible with FromForm in Minimal APIs for .NET 8 Preview 6 #49526
    8.0-rc2
  • Cannot resolve symbol 'RenderModeInteractiveServer' #52048
  • protected override void OnInitialized() firing twice #52111
  • Create default `IdentityErrorDescriber` for some languages #5724
    Backlog
  • Guidance on using Azure AD authentication with Blazor web app #52122
  • <script>-tag in Razor pages ignored for Blazor WebAssembly .NET 7 projects (.NET 8 works though) #52073
  • Analyzer: ASP0023 Ambiguous route warning when targeting .NET 8 and using [action] #52066
  • .NET 8 : dockerfile not working #52092
  • Existing Blazor WASM app fails to build with Visual Studio 17.8.0 #52107
  • TypeError: Failed to fetch in Blazor .net 8.0 with InteractiveAuto #51857
  • System.Net.Internals.SocketExceptionFactory.ExtendedSocketException #51927

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] do not enhance form when method = "dialog" or target != "_self" #52133
    area-blazor
  • Fallback to ArrayPool in Kestrel #52106
    Perf, feature-kestrel, area-networking

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix the `::after` root component element selector #52105
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.1
  • Update milestones for December #52134
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Disambiguate type names by containing assembly in WellKnownTypes #52130
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, analyzer, area-minimal, 8.0.1
  • Disambiguate type names by containing assembly in WellKnownTypes #50969
    area-mvc, analyzer, area-minimal, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix Blazor error UI CSS, making the dismiss button visible #50846
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • Update CODEOWNERS #52108
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with action replacement #52034
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0] Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with switch #52035
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 8.0.1
  • Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52104
    area-infrastructure
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
